synthesis_conditions.equipment: Linbro multiwell tissue plates, MarResearch CCD detector, synchrotron X-ray source
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Flash-freezing and synchrotron radiation required for data collection

synthesis_conditions.preparation_method: Adding 0.6 µL of a solution 0.2 M of ZnCl2 to a drop containing crystals of Complex 1
synthesis_conditions.equipment: MarResearch CCD detector, synchrotron X-ray source
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystals damaged and color change observed upon addition of ZnCl2

synthesis_conditions.preparation_method: Adding 0.6 µL of a solution 0.2 M of NiCl2 to a drop containing crystals of Complex 1
synthesis_conditions.equipment: MarResearch CCD detector, synchrotron X-ray source
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystals damaged and color change observed upon addition of NiCl2
